name: Terrible Puzzle 2021
description: 15 Simple puzzles on a mystical theme. Each level consists of 16 elements that must be rotated in the desired direction and dragged into place. At the beginning of the level, you see the image for 5 seconds, and then it disappears. In this version of the game, the help button is disabled, which was in previous games, since the levels are very simple. The game has a choice of levels, and you can start the game from the level you choose. Sometimes a spider appears on the screen that will distract you, you can get rid of it by clicking on it. The game will delight you with nice graphics and calm music.
